Pre-Game Insights: India is looking stronger and are the favorites to win the game.
Some youngsters will make their debut for the first time in International cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium, Gwalior is expected to be similar to traditional Gwalior pitches, which are typically batting-friendly.
The weather for Sunday, October 6, will be sunny with a high of 33°C and a low of 25°C.
Others: India and Bangladesh have faced each other in 14 matches in T20, out of which India has won 13 and Bangladesh has come out victorious on 1 occasion.
